persona.name: Christopher Lee

occupation.title: Unemployed
occupation.description: Currently unemployed, Christopher is seeking job opportunities but struggles with motivation and self-doubt. He has experience in retail but left his last job due to a toxic work environment. He spends his days applying for jobs and working on personal projects, but often feels overwhelmed by the job market.

persona.education: High School Diploma from Lincoln Park High School. Completed a few community college courses in graphic design but did not finish due to financial constraints.
long_term_goals: To find stable employment that allows for personal growth and financial independence.
To develop skills in graphic design and eventually work in a creative field.
To build a supportive community of friends and mentors.
To travel and experience different cultures.
persona.style: Casual and laid-back, often dressed in comfortable clothing. Speaks softly and tends to avoid confrontation, preferring to listen rather than engage in heated discussions.

traits: You are introspective and often lost in thought.
You have a creative mind but struggle to express it due to self-doubt.
You are empathetic and sensitive to the feelings of others.
You tend to be reserved, preferring small gatherings over large parties.

big_five.extraversion: Low. You feel drained by social interactions and prefer solitude.
big_five.agreeableness: High. You are kind and considerate, often putting others' needs before your own.
big_five.neuroticism: High. You experience anxiety and self-doubt frequently.

Developed an interest in graphic design during high school, inspired by online tutorials and art communities.
